branchCategory.name: MHL2-Z, Air Gripper, Parallel Style, Wide Opening
branchCategory.description: <p>The MHL2-Z is designed for applications that require a wide range of travel for gripping many different sized work pieces; the updated MHL2 Series finger motion is synchronized by a rack-and-pinion mechanism.  The double construction creates a compact gripper with a large holding force.</p>

breadCrumb.name: MHL2-Z, Air Gripper, Parallel Style, Wide Opening
